trans-unit.source: An abstract class used as a base class for other formatters, (for example, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter" />).
trans-unit.target: Clase abstracta usada como clase base para otros formateadores (como, por ejemplo, <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.Atom10ItemFormatter" />).

trans-unit.source: This class is abstract and cannot be instantiated directly.
trans-unit.target: Esta clase es abstracta y no pueden crearse instancias de ella directamente.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to write.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> que se va a escribir.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> class with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> con la instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> must have a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> associated with it.
trans-unit.target: Un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> debe tener un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> asociado a él.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> can then write out the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> to an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: De esta forma, el <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> puede escribir la <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> en una <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.

trans-unit.source: The only way to associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> is by using this constructor.
trans-unit.target: La única manera de asociar un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> a un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> consiste en utilizar este constructor.

trans-unit.source: An XML reader to check.
trans-unit.target: Un lector XML que se va a comprobar.

trans-unit.source: Verifies whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> contains a valid syndication item.
trans-unit.target: Comprueba si el <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> especificado contiene un elemento de distribución RSS 2.0 válido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" />, if the XML reader contains a valid syndication item, otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />, si el lector XML contiene un elemento de distribución válido; de lo contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> used to create the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" />.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> utilizado para crear el objeto <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> utilizando la instancia <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory> recientemente creada no se agrega de forma automática a la instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> utilizada para crearla.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> recientemente creada no se agrega de forma automática a la instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> utilizada para crearla.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to use to create the new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" />.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> que se va a utilizar para crear la nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de la clase <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" />.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationLink> recientemente creada no se agrega de forma automática a la instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> utilizada para crearla.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance used to create the new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> utilizada para crear la nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> instance with the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> con la instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> especificada.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Nueva instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson" />.

trans-unit.source: The newly created <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson> instance is not automatically added to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance used to create it.
trans-unit.target: La instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationPerson> recientemente creada no se agrega de forma automática a la instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> utilizada para crearla.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> associated with the formatter.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene el <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> asociado al formateador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> associated with the formatter.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> asociado al formateador.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> is associated with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> by passing in a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> constructor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> se asocia al <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> pasando una instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> al constructor de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter>.

trans-unit.source: Loads element extensions.
trans-unit.target: Carga las extensiones de elementos.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> desde el que se va a leer.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> to load the element extensions into.
trans-unit.target: El objeto <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> en que se deben cargar las extensiones de elementos.

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable size for an element extension (in bytes).
trans-unit.target: El tamaño máximo permitido de una extensión de elemento (en bytes).

trans-unit.source: Loads element extensions into the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> using the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> and maximum extension size.
trans-unit.target: Carga las extensiones de elementos en la <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> especificada utilizando el <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> y el tamaño de extensión máximo especificados.

trans-unit.source: The RSS 2.0 and Atom 1.0 specifications allow you to add custom element extensions to a syndication feed.
trans-unit.target: Las características técnicas de RS 2.0 y Atom 1.0 permiten agregar extensiones de elemento personalizadas a una fuente.

trans-unit.source: This method allows you to read in these element extensions from an <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.
trans-unit.target: Este método permite leer en estas extensiones de elemento desde un <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>.

trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> desde el que se va a leer.

trans-unit.source: Invalid XML encountered during read.
trans-unit.target: Se ha encontrado un XML no válido durante la lectura.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> to read from.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> desde el que se va a leer.

trans-unit.source: Reads in a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> from the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" />.
trans-unit.target: Lee un <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> desde el <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Creates a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>, associates it with the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> and reads the feed into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance.
trans-unit.target: Crea una nueva instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>, la asocia al <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> y lee la fuente en la instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem>.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> to associate with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> que debe asociarse a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: Associates a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> instance with the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.
trans-unit.target: Asocia una instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem" /> al <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is protected and cannot be called from user code.
trans-unit.target: Este método está protegido y no se puede llamar desde el código de usuario.

trans-unit.source: To associate a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance with a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter>, either create a new <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> instance and pass the constructor a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance or load a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> instance into the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> by calling <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>.
trans-unit.target: Para asociar una instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> a un <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter>, cree una nueva instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> y pase una instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> al constructor o cargue una instancia de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItem> en el <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter> llamando <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter.ReadFrom%28System.Xml.XmlReader%29>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string representation of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Obtiene una representación de cadena de la instancia del <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: Instancia de <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationItemFormatter" />.

trans-unit.target: Intenta analizar una extensión de atributo.

trans-unit.target: Nombre del elemento.

trans-unit.source: The namespace of the element.
trans-unit.target: Espacio de nombres del elemento.

trans-unit.target: Atributo que se va a analizar.

trans-unit.target: La versión de distribución que se va a usar en el análisis.

trans-unit.source: Attempts to parse an attribute extension using the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory" /> instance.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether the attribute was parsed successfully.
trans-unit.target: Valor que indica si se analizó el atributo correctamente.

trans-unit.source: To control how attribute extensions are parsed, derive your own class from <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory> and override the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory.TryParseAttribute%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29> method.
trans-unit.target: Para controlar cómo se analizan las extensiones de atributo, derive su propia clase de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory> e invalide el método <xref:System.ServiceModel.Syndication.SyndicationCategory.TryParseAttribute%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.String%29>.
